meanings.definition: A device in a taxi that calculates the fare based on distance traveled and waiting time.
meanings.sent1: The taximeters in the taxi showed the fare increasing as we drove further.
meanings.sent2: The driver checked the taximeters to determine the total cost of the ride.
meanings.sent3: The taximeters seemed to have a mind of their own, always adding up the fare.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes were like taximeters, calculating every detail of the scenery passing by.
meanings.sent5: The taximeters hummed softly, tallying up the cost of the journey.
